resources.string: Do you want to delete this image?
Do you want to save this image?
Permissions denied. Permissions are required to use the app.
"By first button, it is start automatic crop for image."
"By second button, it is possible to remove text or watermark."
"By third button, it is possible to share image."
"By fourth button, it is possible to permanently delete image."
"Move with one of the eight dots in corners and center of edges for frame resize."
"Grab center area of frame for move without resize it."
"If the top and bottom bars are showed, then you couldn`t be able to manipulate with crop frame. For hide these bars click on display."
"If you want to save the crop, you need press button on bottom bar. For show top and bottom bar again click on display."
"For save the crop press the button on bottom bar."
"For crop settings press button in right corner of the top bar."
"Accuracy setting set number of edge methods use for crop calculation. With more edge methods there is better change for crop to be set correct, but the process of calculation is longer."
"Move helper helping user to set edge of crop line on one of the edges on image in manual move."
"Reload start the process of finding crop again."
"If the bottom bar is showed, then you couldn`t be able to manipulate with frame for replace. For this the bar click on display."
"If you want to save the image with replaced are, you need press button on bottom bar. For show this bar click again on display."
"After position the area for replace press button on bottom. Then choose one of two images by which the area will be replace."
